name: The Last Arrow
description:
The Last Arrow is the finished product of a semester of work by the Video Game Development Association at Cal State Long Beach. Fight waves of demons by catching incoming arrows and firing them right back!

GRIPPING STORY:

Follow the story of Xun, a lone archer who must warn her lands of the return of an ancient threat

GORGEOUS ART:

Experience a specialized art style based upon Chinese watercolor painting.

UNIQUE MUSIC:

The unique soundtrack for The Last Arrow includes singing bowls, throat singing, a Filipino vocalist, and some orchestral elements. Featuring the Lennon Award-winning song "Kundiman" by Joe Sanders.

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS:

Survive unending waves of enemies in Endless Mode. Record your high scores on the in-game leaderboard.
